extendedInfo.description: DIVE IN AND JOIN NEMO ON HIS LATEST ADVENTURE.BUILD A BEAUTIFUL REEF, AND MAKE A HOME FOR YOUR FAVORITE FINDING NEMO CHARACTERS!Nemo and his dad, Marlin, set out to build the coolest reef in his class. Help Nemo create a best-in-class underwater retreat, and discover the secrets to building a permanent home for his friends!â Continue Nemo's story and adventures beneath the sea!â Create and personalize your very own underwater paradise.â Make a home for your favorite characters from Finding Nemo including Dory, Gill, Bloat, Bubbles, and more!â Find the different combinations of plants and decorations to delight Nemo's friends and other exotic fish.â Discover and plant rare seeds to attract extremely rare and mysterious fish.â Collect over 50 kinds of fish to enhance your world!â Visit your friends' reefs, and compare their collection of fish to your own!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This is a fantasticly fabulous and amazing game. I love it..
reviews.author: Loida Gardonia

reviews.title: has not been improved, it robs money from your card
reviews.comment: this is a very fun game, I really enjoy playing this, however, when I bought extra pearls, my money was taken and no pearls were given. DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING EXTRA! you will lose your money and you will not get what you purchase!!!! I would give it 5 stars if it were not for the problem of stealing, I have tried to contact Disney to resolve this issue, no response, no refund...I was robbed by Disney :(
reviews.author: Janness Delaney

reviews.title: Very cute game :D
reviews.comment: Beautiful graphics and soothing music, nice relaxing game to calm you :)
reviews.author: Anne Huang

reviews.title: Rip off! !!!!
reviews.comment: Come on, really!  8 pearls for chest. Go back to the way it use to be. Still freezing and kicking me off. The game never makes it to the fifth day to get the 5 pearls. This game feels like its become all about how much money they can get    by making you buy pearls. I wouldn\'t tell my worst friend about this game.
reviews.author: Donna Humphrey

reviews.title: Excellent game!
reviews.comment: I love playing this game, its relaxing and easy to play. For that I give it five stars!
reviews.author: Ronda Austad

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: My daughter and I play this together, the music is very calming and the colours are nice and bright. Not exactlyexciting, but passes a few minutes here and there.
reviews.author: Samantha Feeney

reviews.title: Fun and exciting waiting to see what comes next
reviews.comment: Lots of fun and beautiful coral ect.... Love nemo
reviews.author: Louis Ledesma

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: The graphics are stunning, the game play easy to understand and the music is relaxing. I have nothing negative to say!
reviews.author: Aimee Phillips

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This a fun addictive app. My 4 year old loves helping me play it as well. We love this movie!
reviews.author: Felicia Werner

reviews.title: attractive scenery
reviews.comment: A very nice app for young children or anyone who likes to design creatively
reviews.author: Rita Cannon

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: I love this game!  Can\'t wait to log in each day and see what new tasks Nemo has to perform.  Really a cute, visually appealing experience.
reviews.author: Marci Shope

reviews.title: LOVE NEMO!
reviews.comment: And this super adorable game is an easy and relaxing way to pass the time. Very enjoyable.
reviews.author: Jo Miller

reviews.title: Great game!! Love it.
reviews.comment: Very good game. Easy to use, my 5yr old loves it!!
reviews.author: Lindsey Hartwig

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Fun game and I had a issue and the quickly sorted it so thank u :) I would give 5 stars if we were able to add friends with the random reefs we can visit... its hard to add friends but otherwise wonderful :)
reviews.author: Phillipa Searle

reviews.title: Very fun and informative
reviews.comment: Lots to learn here and enjoyable, relaxing app
reviews.author: Tammy Smith

reviews.title: Cute game!
reviews.comment: It\'s perfect for relaxation.   Soft music, great underwater graphics.  Easy to use interface.  Bonus: I don\'t have to spam my friends to keep playing!!
reviews.author: Susan Lewis

reviews.title: Love this game. Im a Pisces so i love fish and aquariums, whatnot
reviews.comment: Love this game. I\'m a Pisces so naturally enjoy tropical fish, water whatnot
reviews.author: Laura Sharp

reviews.title: Yes
reviews.comment: Well, I used to love my movie nemo so I got this game which is cool and awesome. I love this game!
reviews.author: Grace Solis

reviews.title: Fun for the family
reviews.comment: Love this game easy for my children to play.  Love the colours very relaxing
reviews.author: Kathleen Harris

reviews.title: Good... Very fun
reviews.comment: It\'s a very good game and very relaxing... Currently however it doesn\'t open at all and not sure if uninstalling and then re installing will help or make me just loose everything ? Please help and I\'ll rate 5 stars!
reviews.author: Candi SP
